Posts.Content: I do NOT want to gain weight!  I am already 5'6" and 215 (55, post-menopausal, and a couch potato), so i was kinda hoping this experience could "help me" lose weight!  Can anyone tell me if the course of "TAC" chemo i will start next week -- that's Taxotere, Adriamycin (doxorubicin), Cyclophosphamide -- may be likely be a trigger to gain weight?  I am ER+, so anti-estrogen (steroid?) treatment may be a thing at some point.  Is very much the Grrr...  Send me some hope, yall -- or at least some tips to help offset! (Blargh, i may actually have to eat better and move and stuff!)
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen and weight gain
